title: A cozy place for you and your pets to call home. Pet friendly!
posting_body: ['Residences on Bedford', '1425 Bedford St', 'Stamford, CT 06905', 'A wonderful home in Stamford is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous Efficiency bedroom 1 bathroom renting for $1709 - $1905 per month.', 'This unit comes with 529 sq ft.', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', "With renovated apartments, luxury amenities, and a location that can't be beat, The Residences on Bedford is the best way to find your dream apartment.", 'Call us to schedule a tour to view one of our 1 or 2 bedroom apartments or apply online today to find your new dream home.', "We can't wait to hear from you and we look forward in helping you make The Residences on Bedford your new home!", '(203) 208-3262', 'Community Highlights:', '❖ 24 Hour Convenience Store', '❖ Bowling Alley', '❖ Business Center', '❖ Clubhouse', '❖ Fitness Center', '❖ Gas Grills', '❖ Parks Nearby', '❖ Pet Friendly', '❖ Play Area', '❖ Pool', '❖ 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '❖ Beautiful Picnic Areas', '❖ Close to Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '❖ Elegant Clubroom', '❖ Free Wi-Fi access in Common Areas', '❖ Ice Skating Rink **Winter Only', '❖ Laundry Facilities on Every Floor', '❖ Near Downtown Stamford', '❖ Online Payments Available', 'Unit Highlights:', '❖ Balcony', '❖ Black Appliances', '❖ Blinds', '❖ Garage', '❖ Gas Ranges', '❖ Heating', '❖ Large, Private Balconies', '❖ Spectacular Views in Select Units', '❖ Stainless Steel appliances in Select Units', '❖ Updated Interior Finishes', 'Contact:', '(203) 208-3262', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Leasing Options:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'We charge a $500 non-refundable fee for each pet.', 'We also charge $75 for pet rent for each pet monthly.', 'Pet Types: Cats and Dogs', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Weight Limit: 35 lbs.', 'Maximum pets per unit: 2', 'Management:', 'JRK Property Holdings', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'DA45B2ACBE25455']
